text: @realDonaldTrump Wow, I feel so safe with you at the helm. "Insert sarcastic voice"..... People of privilege, like your self are so far from reality you'll never understand what pain and suffering is. Maybe you need to get covid-19 just to understand how YOUR killing people. #locktrumpup
